Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui

Class GUIView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.GUIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUISceneControllerDelegate, HomeSceneControllerDelegate, LobbySceneControllerDelegate, SettingsSceneControllerDelegate, SetupSceneControllerDelegate
public class GUIView
extends View
implements LobbySceneControllerDelegate, SetupSceneControllerDelegate, SettingsSceneControllerDelegate, HomeSceneControllerDelegate
Brief The Graphical User Interface implementation of the View. It uses JavaFX through a helper GUIApp reference.
See Also:
View
